response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you surpasses $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are excited to extend an offer to you at a price of $950,000. We believe this is a fair and competitive price that reflects the product's true value while allowing us to maximize our earnings. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
